targets.rawSql:
USE [LogRhythm_LogMart];
SELECT
  [Avg MPS] = CAST(SUM(CAST(CountProcessedLogs as BIGINT)) AS real) / CAST(DATEDIFF(ss,$__timeFrom(),$__timeTo()) as BIGINT),
	[Max MPS] = CAST(MAX(CountProcessedLogs) AS float) / 60.0
FROM
	[dbo].StatsDeploymentCountsMinute with (NOLOCK)
WHERE  $__timeFilter(StatDate);

SELECT
  COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.MsgSource with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  RecordStatus = 1 AND Name NOT LIKE 'AI Engine%'

select 
  $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d') AS time,
  [Logs Processed] = SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)),
  [Actual Logs Processed By AIEs] = SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)),
  [Logs Processed By AIEs] = 
    case 
      when SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)) = 0 THEN 0
      when SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint)) <= SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint)) THEN SUM(cast(CountAnalyzedLogs as bigint))
      else SUM(cast(CountProcessedLogs as bigint))
    end,
  [Events Forwarded By LMs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsForwarded as bigint)),
  [Events Forwarded By AIEs] = SUM(cast(CountEventsAIEngine as bigint)),
  [Alarms] = SUM(cast(CountAlarms as bigint))
from 
  LogRhythm_LogMart.dbo.StatsDeploymentCountsHour with (NOLOCK)
WHERE 
  $__timeFilter(StatDate)
group by 
   $__timeGroup(StatDate, '1d');

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
Where AlarmStatus = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
	msg.Alarm_Priority,
	AVG(amsg.TTD) avgTTD,
	AVG(amsg.TTR) avgTTR,
	COUNT(*) as Count
FROM
  (SELECT
	CASE 
		WHEN Priority >= 90 THEN 'Critical'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 80 and 89 THEN 'High'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 65 and 79 THEN 'Medium'
		WHEN Priority BETWEEN 50 and 64 THEN 'Low'
		WHEN Priority < 50 THEN 'Very Low'
	END AS Alarm_Priority,
	MsgID
FROM 
	LogRhythm_Events.dbo.Msg with (NOLOCK)) msg
	  JOIN
	(SELECT 
		a.DateInserted,
		atm.MARCMsgID,
		a.AlarmID,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.OpenedOn) TTT,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.GeneratedOn,am.InvestigatedOn) TTD,
		DATEDIFF(MINUTE,am.InvestigatedOn,am.ClosedOn) TTR
	FROM 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK) 
			JOIN 
		LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.AlarmToMARCMsg atm with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = atm.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[AlarmMetrics] am with (NOLOCK) 
			ON a.AlarmID = am.AlarmID
			JOIN
		[LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].AlarmRule ar
		  ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID 
		WHERE 
		  ar.[AlarmType] = 5
		    and
      $__timeFilter(a.DateInserted)) amsg
		ON amsg.MARCMsgID = msg.MsgID
GROUP BY
	msg.Alarm_Priority
ORDER BY 
	CASE msg.Alarm_Priority
		WHEN 'Critical' THEN 1
		WHEN 'High' THEN 2
		WHEN 'Medium' THEN 3
		WHEN 'Low' THEN 4
		WHEN 'Very Low' THEN 5
	END

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
Where AlarmStatus = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

SELECT
	count(*) as Count
FROM
  	LogRhythm_Alarms.dbo.Alarm a with (NOLOCK)
  	  JOIN
	  LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule ar
	    ON a.AlarmRuleID = ar.AlarmRuleID
WHERE
  ar.AlarmType = 5
    AND
  $__timeFilter(DateInserted)

select FullName,
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,OpenedOn)) as 'AVG Reponse Time (min)', avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,ClosedOn)) as 'AVG Resolution Time (min)'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] on Alarm.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID 
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
where $__timeFilter(AlarmDate) and FullName is not NULL
group by FullName

select FullName,
avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,OpenedOn)) as 'AVG Reponse Time (min)', avg(DATEDIFF(minute,GeneratedOn,ClosedOn)) as 'AVG Resolution Time (min)'
from [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].AlarmMetrics
join [LogRhythm_Alarms].[dbo].[Alarm] on Alarm.AlarmID=AlarmMetrics.AlarmID 
join LogRhythmEMDB.dbo.AlarmRule on Alarm.AlarmRuleID=AlarmRule.AlarmRuleID
left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] on Person.PersonID=LastPersonID
where $__timeFilter(AlarmDate) and FullName is not NULL
group by FullName

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0 AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

SELECT [Owner], [Case Collaborators],  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG (ss, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime), CAST([Date Created]as datetime))) TTD,  (SELECT DATEDIFF_BIG(ss, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime), CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTR,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Earliest Evidence] as datetime),CAST([Date Created] as datetime))) TTQ,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Incident] as datetime))) TTI,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Incident] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTM,  (SELECT DATEDIFF(minute, CAST([Date Created] as datetime),CAST([Date Mitigated] as datetime))) TTV FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[vw_Cases]
WHERE $__timeFilter([Date Created])

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] c with (NOLOCK)
  	join 
  	LogRhythm_CMDB.dbo.CaseStatus cs
  	ON c.CaseStatusID = cs.CaseStatusID
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated]) AND cs.IsClosedStatus = 0 AND cs.Name = 'Incident'

SELECT
 count(*) as Count
FROM
  	[LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] with (NOLOCK)
WHERE
  $__timeFilter([DateCreated])

select * from
 
(
SELECT p.FullName as "Case Owner",count(c.Name) as CaseCount,
(Convert(nvarchar, Case
When CaseStatusID = 1 Then 'Created'
When CaseStatusID = 2 Then 'Completed'
When CaseStatusID = 3 Then 'Incident'
When CaseStatusID = 4 Then 'Mitigated'
When CaseStatusID = 5 Then 'Resolved' End)) as CaseStatusID
  FROM [LogRhythm_CMDB].[dbo].[Case] as c
  left join [LogRhythmEMDB].[dbo].[Person] as p on p.PersonID=c.PersonID
WHERE  $__timeFilter(c.DateCreated)
group by p.FullName,CaseStatusID
 
) d
pivot
(
sum(CaseCount)
for CaseStatusID in (Created,Completed,Incident,Mitigated,Resolved)
) piv

panels.title: Cases Status By Analyst Last Month
